item.title: Why fungi are crucial for biodiversity?
item.description: On International day for biological diversity, we bring you the kingdom of fungi. There are 3.2 million different species of fungi in the world, acting as the interface between life and death and playing a key role in the planet’s ecosystems.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Fungi, biodiversity, ecosystem, nature, environment
item.media:title: Why fungi are crucial for biodiversity?
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Fungi, biodiversity, ecosystem, nature, environment
